Index.title: Aura Peptides
Index.hero_subtitle: Precision-engineered lyophilized peptide for advanced laboratory research. The first triple-agonist (GLP-1, GIP, GCGR) available in a premium, verifiable format for the European market.
Index.section_science_desc: Engineered for researchers demanding the highest level of purity, accuracy, and absolute privacy across Europe.
Index.card1_desc: Every single batch is third-party tested with HPLC and Mass Spectrometry protocols to guarantee purity and detect endotoxins.
Index.card2_desc: No fiat, no tracking, complete privacy. Pay seamlessly with BTC, ETH, USDT or Monero through our integrated secure gateway. 100% anonymous fulfillment.
Index.card3_desc: Dispatched from within the European Union. No customs delays, no import duties. Fast and stealthy courier delivery.
Index.footer_copy: © 2026 Aura Peptides Europe. For Research Purposes Only.
Index.faq_q1: Is there any customs risk or package seizure?
Index.faq_a1: Absolutely not. All our products are shipped directly from within the European Union. There are no customs checks, no surprise import duties, and zero risk of seizure.
Index.faq_a2: Standard delivery across Europe usually takes 3 to 5 business days after order fulfillment. You will receive a tracking link as soon as the package leaves our European warehouse.
Index.faq_a3: Yes, every single batch undergoes rigorous testing via third-party HPLC and Mass Spectrometry protocols to ensure a minimum purity of 99.8%. Certificates of Analysis (COAs) are publicly available.
Index.faq_q4: Why do you only accept Cryptocurrency payments?
Index.faq_a4: To guarantee the total privacy and security of our research clients. Payments via Crypto (BTC, USDC, SOL etc.) prevent third parties or banks from tracking your sensitive research acquisitions.
